text: was a Japanese castle from the Heian period. It was used until 1602. It was built in Sano, Tochigi Prefecture. The site was made a National Historic Site in 2014. Karasawayama Shrine is now located on its grounds. == Sources == * == References == == Other websites == * Sano city Official site * JCaste * Karasawayama Jinja home page Category:Castles in Japan Category:10th-century buildings and structures Category:Tochigi Prefecture
title: Karasawa Castle
